name: Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR)
description: MBSR is an evidence-based program that uses mindfulness meditation to alleviate stress, anxiety, depression, and pain. It teaches participants to focus attention on the present moment in a non-judgmental way.
references: Kabat-Zinn, J. (1990). Full Catastrophe Living: Using the Wisdom of Your Body and Mind to Face Stress, Pain, and Illness. Delta.
Grossman, P., Niemann, L., Schmidt, S., & Walach, H. (2004). Mindfulness-based stress reduction and health benefits: A meta-analysis. Journal of Psychosomatic Research, 57(1), 35-43.
